page.title: 05WILDLIFE,MARLOW BOTTOM
page.content: WE VISITED A LADY IN OUR SQUARE AND INTERVIEWED HER FOR INFORMATION ON THE VARIOUS{WILDLIFE}IN THE AREA.THE LIST IS AS FOLLOWS:{ {STOATS,WEASELS,FERRETS,FOXES,DEER,KEST {REL}AND{OWLS.}THE LATTER WERE FILMED BY{WILDTRACK}OF THE{B.B.C.}THE MAIN LANDSCAPE IN AND AROUND HER GARDEN IS WOODLAND.{MUSK DEER}ARE A FAIRLY UNCOMMON SPECIES OF{DEER,}WHICH THRIVE IN THE SURROUNDING WOODS.SHE USUALLY LEAVES DEAD{CHICKS}ON THE BIRD TABLE AND THE WILD{KESTREL}TAKES THE FOOD TO HIS FAVOURITE PLUCKING PLACE WHERE HE PLUCKS THE LIFELESS{CHICK}AND EATS IT.IN ORDER TO FILM THE{OWLS,WILDTRACK USED ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY,INCLUDING A LIGHT BEAM WHICH TRIGGERS A{CAMERA}TO TAKE PHOTOS OF THE{OWLS}IN MOTION,GRABBING THE FOOD FROM THE BIRD TABLE.
